description:
Hello

On spawning instance firstly after uploading image to registry, docker container runs with command "sh", instead of command, written in image.

Next spawns work as expected.
title: First spawn of docker image starts with 'sh' command instead of image CMD

comments.content:
Hello

On spawning instance firstly after uploading image to registry, docker container runs with command "sh", instead of command, written in image.

Next spawns work as expected.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rrader

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/65393
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: docker isn't in the nova tree currently.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: @jogo - in the future, it would be helpful if you might send these over to the nova-docker project. This (and the other recent) bug has already had a fix committed. Thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ewindisch

comments.content: Eric, no problem sorry for not doing that before.
